condition.name: Amaris Coup (in the Hegemony)/First Succession War/Second Succession War

additional: Cortana, regardless of whether she yet exists, will be plugged into your smart device and be completely immune to rampancy. The Tier 5 version of her reflects her status at the end of the original trilogy. Body Talent will give Spartans a functioning sex drive, and guarantees the level of no lower than Spartan-II physiology.
Captured copies of Elizabeth and Meliodas(Excluding Holy War(Past)) will remain affected by their respective curses unless both stages of Destiny Defense are bought for them>

worldName: Gate: And thus the JSDF fought there

condition.name: Initial opening of the gate: Ginza

additional: Body Defense will protect you from all the negatives effects of the Master-Servant Contract.
You can use bonfires as they are intended.

worldName: How Not to Summon a Demon Lord

additional: When capturing a rider one also captures their dragon.
You can pay 5 points to have your Digimon gain human forms that they can freely transform to and back from
Walk in/Drop-in do not gain a power from psyren's atmosphere, Extras do but it is completely random strength.

Possession Defense will protect you from Noriko Dragon Roar ability.

Information Defense will protect you from the Dragon Eyes prediction ability.

A special setting taking place in a large town or small city one could find a generic slice of life anime.

Contains any tier 1 waifus of your choice for potential capture.

Due to the world's slice of life nature, nobody will age, be maimed, or die as long as you're here, though you may optionally turn this off. Nobody will find any of this weird.

If you select Tier 2 Town, the protections against maiming and death are automatically turned off, but you can also encounter any tier 2 waifus of your choice.

Dark One's taint on Saidin halves effectiveness of Corruption, Mind, & Soul Defenses for all male Channelers until the taint is cleanse from the One Power. Only applies during the Third Age.

Users of the One Power are subjected to its gendered rules, Saidin channelers, the male half of the One Power being on average stronger than Saidar channelers, while a linked circle of 13 Saidar channelers can overpower the strongest Saidin channeler.
Body Defense will protect you from the beast plague and physical effect of insight while Mind Defense will protect you from it’s mental effects
Possession Defense will protect you from becoming a Wendigo

May purchase decks from catalog for 1 point. Summoning methods of later generations are not usable on duel disks of earlier generations. Psychic Dueling can be bought using local power template option.
Rating is variable by time period/Timeline.

condition.name: During the Events of WoW 'The Burning Crusade'
During the Events of WoW 'Wrath of the Lich King'
During the Events of WoW 'Mists of Pandaria'
During the Events of WoW 'Warlords of Draenor'
During the Events of WoW 'Battle for Azeroth'
Zombie can remain silent for surprise attacks, and decay much slower

worldName: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir
Life With a Slave - Teaching Feeling
Takarakuji de 40 Oku Atattanda kedo Isekai ni Ijuusuru

additional: The world has a system, and actions taken while lacking a class will give a class appropriate to the actions(acting adorable gives cinnamon bun class, killing a bunch of people gives murderer class, etc) this only applies until you have a class. doing things associated with your class gives class skills. The skills start at rank F and are improved by doing them. Rank D and above require skill points, more skill points are required the higher rank the skill is. Killing things and doing class-appropriate actions levels you up and gives class skill points. Doing things unrelated to your class may give a general skill. General skill points are earned by completing quests for the world and killing dungeons.
It is recommended that you purchase a madness nullifying or sanity protecting power/defense.
If you take Extra and choose Sinner as your species you will be unable to leave the Pride Ring unless summoned or you at least filled Exit Stage left. Choosing Hellborn does not have this limitation.

worldName: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
additional: Captured Princess magic become independent of their Runestone.

All Techniques and Magic you learn inside the F.I.V.R. MMORPG 'Boundless' is real. Ingredients, Materials and other Items can be stored inside your Pocket Space/Inventory and will even be automatically supplied should you have a Warehouse District.
All ghost beacome halfa's, being able to change between their new human half-human-half-ghsot form or their full ghost form
While magic does exist, the vastly more commonly used "Techniques" are psychic in nature.

Photon Arts require Martial Talent, Soul Talent, Science Talent,and Engineering Talent.
Partner Machines will be treated like familiars if you capture their owners or as Waifus in an AU.
Pets will be treated as familiars or as Waifus in an AU
To heal both Mirei Mikuna and Karen Erra when captured you need Soul Defense x2 and Body Defense x2.
Capturing Lou also means capturing her other clones/replicas, the actual number of Lou models made is classified, but the number is known to exceed 905. All Lou's are connected through thought and can rely information to any model at anytime assuming no interference takes place.

All kith may be bound, but only sapient non-Kith races. Bound companions whose abilities are ordinarily dependent on Eora's abundant environmental soul essence can utilize these abilities off-world. Bound animatic constructs, including gods, can be sustained by infusions of magical energy other than soul essence comparable to their ordinary requirements.

condition.name: Waidwen Victorious! (AU: Raedceras wins Saint's War)
The Adra Dims (AU: Everything that could go wrong, has gone wrong)

worldName: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
additional: All monster created or modificated by Ancient Magic mekes them into familiars

worldName: I've Been Killing Slimes for 300 Years and Maxed Out My Level
additional: Entering this world or gaining a companion from here will allow access to the world’s leveling system
John Connor has a T-800 or Cameron as a familiar. Terminator Genisys Sarah Connor has a T-800 as a familiar.

All Fauna are capturable as familiars by the contractor or by companions.  They may be captured by in universe methods or by stamp or other company provided methods.  No credits are obtained through this.

The contractor and any companions are always able to percieve supernatural and/or spiritual beings or events. However, interacting with said beings or events requires magical, ki, or other form of supernatural ability. 

Elemental Cloaks, Symbiote and derived suits, or magical circles qualify. Tempest jewelry or the Stamp only qualifies if the contractor has said abilities themselves.
Starting in a world ruled by one or several Rank 8 beings(the equivalent of at least t10, possibly t11 in Waifu Catalogue ratings).

condition.name: Starting in the Central Continent, in the Magus World.
Starting in the world of the gods.

additional:
Mistles work as intended for those with both Soul Talent and Everlasting Talents, but can be corrupted and turn into "Lost" this can be resisted and/or prevented with enough "Willpower/Mental-Fortitude", or those with both the Curruption and Possession Defenses.

These only apply to those wishing to use Mistles for their intended purposes.
Innocences crystalize when the Waifu/Husbando is captured

worldName: Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter

additional: Shendu has all 12 talismans, and Tarakudo has all nine Oni Generals as familiars.
Companion's Cursed Gear become a familiar when captured

worldName: The Hero Who Returned Remains The Strongest In The Modern World
Exalted versus the World of Darkness

additional: The mermaids are able to control their transformations when entering water rather than automatically turning into mermaids. Their pets serve as familiars.
Melina allows you and your waifus to pay for level-ups with Runes, just like their counterparts from the other games.

worldName: I Have a Mansion in the Post-apocalyptic World

additional: Were-Waifus/Husbandos are inmune to full moons when captured

The City is a spherical mega-structure roughly 966 million miles in diameter. You can choose your general starting locations properties and will start in the middle layers within half of a million miles of your choices.
All human scale sophonts within Blame! are fully human compatible.
While within Blame! the Mapper perk gains general localized information that any group of over 50 humans within 1 AU of you knows, and the Target Tracker perk records the general direction of anything as large as a human moving under its own power within 1 million miles of you.
The Virus is still carried by some surviving humans; it can be fully resisted as a carrier by Body Defense I, and is fully destroyed by Body Defense II. All humans you capture with the Net Terminal Gene inactive or damaged within them can have the Gene reactivated, if you wish.

condition.name: Silicon Life has taken control of The City
Humanity has regained control of The City

additional:
Due to the nature of The Land while the barrier is in place no gods can enter.

Due to the nature of this universe when entering if you have any Talents at all you gain access to the gamer/litrpg system this reality uses.

Eldritch magic BAD.

condition.name: Earth start of age of Chaos

worldName: Reincarnation of the Strongest Sword God

condition.name: When Shi Feng reincarnates the 2nd time

additional: These vampires and werewolves are biological not magical and still have their souls.
Regardless of Arrival Time-Line you will be given access to the God and Devil System just the same as everyone else in the world, and it will function normally as such.
In game users are capturable, but only have the abilities and rank of the in game avatar, not the in-universe User/Admin.

worldName: Cross Ange: Rondo of Angel and Dragon
Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere
I was Caught up in a Hero Summoning but that world was at Peace
Sleepy Princess in the Demon Castle
The Death Mage Who Doesn’t Want a Fourth Time

additional: You can pick waifus up to T3 to inhabit the world. If the waifu comes from setting that has technology not present in our current tech, this tech will be incorporated into setting at large. War-torn Solar system expands on it to T6 and includes space warfare, magic and psionics. Maximal Upgrade being War-torn galaxy expands to T10 expanding war to galactic proportions and extremely dangerous planet ending warfare.

Non-humanoid familiars may be integrated as demon spirits. (Pokemon, Digimon, etc.)
Demon Spirit integration counts as an independent control method.
